title: Pat Monahan / Rotator Cuff Surgery
description: Hey, Soul Sisters (a.k.a HypochondriActor listeners) now that you're back in the atmosphere, we're excited to share with you this amazing episode! Sean and Priyanka talk about what makes a perfect film and the movies they love to show people. Pat Monahan "drives by" the podcast to discuss Train's new album and the time he tore his rotator cuff.
author: info@hazymills.com (Hazy Mills Network)
